EndogenousConcepts.Description: Endogenous concepts; the entire names will be created

Units.Description: Names of units in panel models

ReducibleNames.Description: Names of reducible variables in factor models

Order.Description: Autoregressive order of the VAR model

HasIntercept.Description: True if the model includes an intercept (constant) term

NumFactors.Description: Number of factors to be formed from reducibles

ShockConcepts.Description: Names of structural shock concepts; the entire names

IdentificationHorizon.Description: Number of periods for which the VMA

HasCrossUnits.Description: True if cross-effects are present in models with multiple units
